summary: An intellectual young law student who renounces a promising career to become a schoolteacher in a remote poor village is forced to make a puzzling decision, in the aftermath of her rape.
cast: Dolores Fonzi|Oscar Martínez|Esteban Lamothe|Silvina Sabater|Cristian Salguero|Mariana Mitre|Julián Tello|Ezequiel Díaz|Veroka Fedeli|Alejandra Rivera Coutto|Dora Villalba|José María Barrios Hermosa|Fernando Molina|Silvia Warwnycia|Amado González|Marcos Machuca|Thiny Karai Ramirez|Walter Casco|Laura López Moyano|Lorenzo Campo|Damian Silvero|Jonathan Brizuela|Natalia Paniagua|Susan Braun|David Gamarra|Elias Ojeda|Alexis Amarilla Baez|Christian Cuadra|Marilin Escobar|Nicolas Paredez|Joana Paredez|Gastón Cáceres|Amador Gomez|Andrea Quattrocchi|Rafael Gómez de Jesús|Marcio Santos|Antonio Barbosa|Jorge Barquinero|Gabriela Pastor|Lucía Ruiz Ortiz|César Yaya|Graciela Ocampo|Verónica Llinás|Osvaldo Djeredjian|Jorge Javier Falcon|Leonardo Tupa Fernandez|Rolando Gimenez|Hugo Javier Cardozo|Rafael Solano|Roberto Vieira Silva|Xayenne Prado|Gary Meza|Claudia Lagable|Omar Holz|Enrique Pera|Daniel Eberhart|Ignacio Benítez|Héctor González
title: Paulina
